Articles.Content:
I've got about 120 mods. Either something is wrong, or one of the mods changes the way maneuver nodes. Whenever I create one, the time until node and estimated burn time aren't down by the navball and the delta-v needed for the burn isn't their either. The only thing that shows up, are a line of dots by the navball. 

 

The mods I have that might have something to do with it:

 

mechjeb

precise maneuver

kerbal engineer

 

thanks
Sounds like better burn time. No other mod i know pus food by the navball
